concept.title: Aikido, The Gentle Martial Art
concept.shortdesc: Aikido is a purely defensive martial art in which you train cooperatively with a partner with the goal of achieving harmony between attacker and defender.

conbody.p: The practice of Aikido is based a set of basic principles taken from the movements of traditional Japanese sword fighting.

Beginners typically start with learning just the first two or three principles:
